home.title: DachsHunt
home.slogan: We hunt your package as if it were a badger
home.instructions: Insert a phone number on the field on the right and quickly check out all the packages registered to it.
home.inputErrorMessage: To have the full experience, enter 729478015.

ordersItemDetails.title: Here are your package details:
ordersItemDetails.positiveLocationStatusMessage: Your package has been registered and is ready to be picked up
ordersItemDetails.negativeLocationStatusMessage: Your package is waiting for registration
